title: Bill Announcement – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Infrastructure & Technology	

Issued on:
August 23, 2019
On Friday, August 23, 2019, the President signed into law:H.R. 1250, which designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 11158 Highway 146 North in Hardin, Texas, as the Lucas Lowe Memorial Post Office; andH.R. 3245, the “Restore the Harmony Way Bridge Act,” which transfers ownership of the Harmony Way Bridge from the White County Bridge Commission to the States of Illinois and Indiana.
